org.wicketstuff.security.hive.config

Class SwarmPolicyFileHiveFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wicketstuff.security.hive.config.PolicyFileHiveFactory
      • org.wicketstuff.security.hive.config.SwarmPolicyFileHiveFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HiveFactory

    public class SwarmPolicyFileHiveFactory
extends PolicyFileHiveFactory
    Policyfile factory with some extra aliases for wicket specific permissions. By default the following aliases are available ComponentPermission, DataPermission and AllPermissions for org.wicketstuff.security.hive.authorization .permissions.ComponentPermission, org.wicketstuff.security.hive.authorization.permissions.DataPermission and org.wicketstuff.security.hive.authorization.permissions.AllPermissions respectively.
    Author:
    marrink
    See Also:
    PolicyFileHiveFactory
